## Outline of Workflow


### **Data source:** Cooke et al. 2017, Fensterer et al. 2006, Napolitano et al. (in review), Peros et al. 2007   <br><br>
### **Data manipulation:** Calibration of radiocarbon dates <br><br>
### **Packages used:** Bchron, ggplot2, cowplot 

## Our Visualization

### - delta C14 and delta O18 isotope data (proxies for climate change)
### - Archaeological site dates
### - Last appearance dates of extinct species <br><br>
